entries.description: Fixed the issue in the AWS CRT HTTP client where the application could crash if stream.incrementWindow was invoked on a closed stream

entries.category: AWS Backup Storage, Amazon CodeCatalyst, Amazon Cognito Identity, Amazon Cognito Identity Provider, AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM), Amazon Kinesis, AWS Elemental MediaStore Data Plane, Amazon Transcribe Service, Amazon Transcribe Streaming Service
entries.description: Switching a set of services onto the new SRA (Smithy Reference Architecture) identity and auth logic that was released in v2.21.0.
Added support for `@DynamoDBAutoGeneratedUUID` to facilitate the automatic updating of DynamoDB attributes with random UUID.
Updating note for enabling streams for UpdateTable.
This release adds support for Multi-Region Replication with provisioned tables, and Keyspaces auto scaling APIs
